global.hero_sub:
Field support for educators.
Not student programs.

Nothing more. Nothing less.

grid.title: Logistics
grid.desc: Permits, visas, and administrative drag. We handle the friction so you can work.

grid.title: Network
grid.desc: Connections that are actually useful. No networking events. Just the contacts you need.

grid.title: Funding
grid.desc: Capital for action, not promises. Funds move in days, not months.

tracks.title: LAB
tracks.desc: Small cycles. Field conditions. A student team runs a build -> test sequence.

tracks.title: STUDIO
tracks.desc: Local forms. Real practice. Students join a host studio and rehearse.

tracks.title: PANEL
tracks.desc: Nodes. Systems. Coordination. An educator links with a local institution.
